title: Dragon Goes House-Hunting, Vol. 4
description: The Dark Lord of Real EstateThe red dragon Letty has spent months traveling around with Dearia, a kindly elf with the fearsome title of Demon Lord. But just how did Dearia wind up as both an architect and the Lord of Darkness? Itâ€™s time for the full tale of his past to come to light: the house-hunting adventures of a young elf and a mighty black dragon!
author: Kawo Tanuki
